title: The Josh Allen Era, Gruden Mania, Panic in Detroit, and Week 2 Preview | The Ringer NFL Show (Ep. 300)
description:
The Ringer’s Robert Mays and Kevin Clark link up to cover the major headlines around the league heading into Week 2, including Josh Allen becoming the starting QB in Buffalo, the Falcons losing key defensive players, and Jon Gruden’s shaky beginning in Oakland (20:00). Then they workshop some hot takes and preview  key Week 2 games (45:00).

      
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit podcastchoices.com/adchoices
